title: 3dAFNItoRaw
description: Convert an AFNI brik file with multiple sub-briks to a raw file with each sub-brik voxel concatenated voxel-wise.

output_file.title: Output File
output_file.description: Name of the output file (not an AFNI dataset prefix). Default is rawxyz.dat.

force_float.title: Force Float Output
force_float.description: Force floating point output. Floating point forced if any sub-brik scale factors not equal to 1.

dataset.title: Input Dataset
dataset.description: Input AFNI dataset with possible modifiers for sub-brick and sub-range selection.
